oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Single-particle entanglement
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Can, M. Ali
Klyachko, Alexander
Shumovsky, Alexander
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Quantum Physics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Using the approach to quantum entanglement based on the quantum fluctuations of observables, we show the existence of perfect entangled states of a single "spin-1" particle. We give physical examples related to the photons, condensed matter physics, and particle physics.
Comment: 7 pages, no figures, submitted to Journal of Optics B
